com.impossibl.postgres.types

Class Type.Codec<InBuffer,OutBuffer>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.impossibl.postgres.types.Type.Codec<InBuffer,OutBuffer>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Type.BinaryCodec, Type.TextCodec
    Enclosing class:
    Type

    public static class Type.Codec<InBuffer,OutBuffer>
extends java.lang.Object
    A pair of related interface methods to encode/decode a type in a specific format. The are mapped to their equivalent procedures in the database.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  Type.Codec.Decoder<InBuffer>
      Decodes the given data into a Java language object
      static interface  Type.Codec.Encoder<OutBuffer>
      Encodes the given Java language object as data the server expects.
